snake module¶

This module contains the main function of ‘snake’ game

platform

Linux

author

Ovod18


snake.INF_HEIGHT: int¶

The information line height.


snake.crit_l: int¶

The critical value of snake length.


snake.crit_length(dw, dh, ih, sw)¶

Calculation the INF_HEIGHT

Parameters

  • dw (int) – The display width.

  • dh (int) – The display height.

  • ih (int) – INF_HEIGHT

  • sw (int) – The snake width.


snake.main(dw, dh, sw, ss)¶

The main function of ‘snake’ game.

Parameters

  • dw (int) – The display width.

  • dh (int) – The display height.

  • sw (int) – The snake width.

  • ss (int) – The snake speed.
